###Excercise 1: Make a Function

This is a simple function designed to return three summary statistics for a variable.
```{r}
range_mean <- function(x){
  stopifnot(is.numeric(x))
  range <- max(x) - min(x)
  mean <- mean(x)
  median <- median(x)
  return(c(range, mean, median))
}

adelie <- penguins %>%
  filter(species == "Adelie") %>%
  drop_na()

range_mean(adelie$bill_length_mm)


bar_function <- function(x){
  ggplot(aes(x)) +
  geom_bar()
}

bar_function(penguins$species)
